rules.summary: Genotype includes the T allele, which is associated with lactase persistence in many populations. Effects vary by ancestry and individual tolerance.
Genotype lacks the T allele and is associated with higher likelihood of lactose non-persistence in many populations. Symptoms still depend on diet and context.

default_summary: No call or unrecognized genotype for rs4988235.

evidence_level.summary: Multiple studies support an association, but effects are population-dependent.

limitations: This is a proxy marker and does not diagnose lactose intolerance. Population effects differ and symptoms are influenced by diet.
references: Enattah et al. 2002 (Nature Genetics) - lactase persistence association
